fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Adds src/ogc-api/csapi/sampling-features.ts implementing client logic for the CSAPI SamplingFeatures resource per Part 2 ┬º10ΓÇô11. Includes listSamplingFeatures() and getSamplingFeatureById() using getSamplingFeaturesUrl() and shared HTTP utilities. Validated against fixture endpoint_samplingFeatures.json.

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Adds src/ogc-api/csapi/properties.ts implementing client logic for CSAPI Properties resource (Part 2 ┬º10ΓÇô11). fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Adds src/ogc-api/csapi/datastreams.ts implementing client logic for CSAPI Datastreams per Part 2 ┬º10ΓÇô11. fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Adds src/ogc-api/csapi/observations.ts implementing client logic for CSAPI Observations per Part 2 ┬º10ΓÇô11. fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Enable strict TypeScript mode for stronger type safety and security

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: - Enabled "strict", "noImplicitAny", and "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames" in tsconfig.json. - Removed JSON comments that were invalid for strict parsing. - Improves compile-time type safety without affecting runtime or API behavior.

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: fix

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Harden CSAPIResource type and improve model typings for security and clarity - Replaced unsafe "[key: string]: any" with a generic type parameter <T = unknown>. - Updated CSAPICollection to support generic typing. - Replaced remaining Record<string, any> with Record<string, unknown>. - Added @see annotations to reference relevant CSAPI specification sections. - Improves type safety and maintainability without altering runtime behavior or schema conformance.

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Fix CSAPI lifecycle tests for strict mode and FeatureCollection alignment - Updated lifecycle tests to use FeatureCollection/features instead of Collection/members. - Ensured .get() test handles optional id safely under strict typing. - Verified compatibility with final CSAPI model and strict TypeScript mode.

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Make CSAPI common.spec.ts strict-mode compliant - Added explicit type annotations for fetched data and link arrays. - Removed implicit any usage flagged by strict TypeScript mode. - Verified functional equivalence with previous test behavior.

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Fix CSAPI helpers.spec.ts for strict mode and model alignment - Updated Elevation parameter expectation to use .name instead of .id. - Added explicit Record<string, unknown> typings for test inputs. - Ensured safe null/undefined handling under strict mode.

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Fix CSAPI model.spec.ts for strict mode and parameter model alignment - Updated test to reference CSAPIParameter.name instead of deprecated id. - Added schema and description to reflect realistic example structure. - Ensured file imports and typings are compatible with strict TypeScript mode.

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Make csapi/helpers.ts strict-mode compliant and type-safe - Added explicit typing for all function parameters and returns. - Replaced implicit any usages with unknown or Record<string, unknown>. - Added safe error handling for dynamic imports. - Verified compatibility with Node ESM import style under esModuleInterop.

fork_only_commits.author: Sam Bolling
fork_only_commits.subject: Fix csapi/model.ts for strict typing and standard compliance - Removed stray bracket and corrected index signature on CSAPIResource. - Replaced unsafe string|T union with Record<string, unknown>. - Ensured all interfaces compile under strict mode. - Verified conformance with OGC 23-001 and 23-002 section mappings.
